name: The Green Fairy
description: This absinthe green topaz shade had a slight gold shift. It has green flakies and emerald micro glitters. I don't think a nun would say that about a hill.

name: Straight to the Elephant
description: A chocolate brown shimmer base with red holo and bronze squares plus black, grey, white and purple matte glitters. It's a little bit funny...

name: The Gothic Tower
description: With a mix of black matte and iridescent colored glitters, this sheer grey/purple shimmer polish goes great over dark colors. Feels so good inside to wear it. ;-)

name: The Sparkling Diamond
description: This beauty is a silver glitter bomb! All variety of silver glitters including silver holo diamond shapes.

name: Come What May
description: Come What May is an iridescent orchid purple with silver flakies and purple holo micro glitters. Semi-sheer, it's opaque in 3 thin coats.

name: The Show Must Go On
description: This polish from the Moulin Rouge collection is a glitter bomb topcoat with holo dust and holo glitters in an array of colors and sizes.

name: Moulin Rouge Full Collection
description:
This set includes all six Moulin Rouge polishes in either full size or mini bottles. 

The Green Fairy
Straight to the Elephant
Come What May
The Gothic Tower
The Sparkling Diamond
The Show Must Go On

name: Satine Duo
description:
This is the first time a duo is being offered from Cinema Swatch! The Satine Duo is inspired by the character from Moulin Rouge, and contains two mini bottles. 

Frightened Bunny - a white crelly with gold flakes, flecks and micro glitters
Smouldering Temptress - a reddish-pink crelly with pink and red micro glitters and black metallic flakies

Each mini is 5ml of hand mixed 3-Free lacquer

name: Snow, Snow, Snow
description: Snow, Snow, Snow has white snowflake glitters surrounded by iridescent glitters of all sizes and matte white micro glitters too! Capture it today! Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Sisters
description: Sisters is an icey blue semi sheer polish with micro rainbow effect glitters. Beautiful, build-able color! Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: A Minstrel Show
description: A Minstrel Show has red holo bells and red holo micro glitters swirl around with white dots and white micros. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: While You're Dancing
description: A pearlescent micro speckle in a whispery pink. The best things happen while you're dancing, after all! Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Glistening Treetops
description: Glistening Treetops is another fun glitter bomb with emerald and lime micro glitters,emerald holo dots, and silver holo slices, diamonds, and snowflakes! Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: 45 Minutes, All to Myself
description: A golden glitter bomb, with various sizes of gold and gold holo hex plus gold diamond glitters! What could be more priceless this holiday season?  Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: White Christmas Full Set
description:
If you can't choose just one favorite from this exciting holiday collection, then you should try them all! This listing is for the full set of White Christmas polishes in either full size or mini. How's that for a slam bang finish?

The set includes:
 
Snow, Snow, Snow
While You're Dancing
A Minstrel Show
Sisters
Glistening Treetops
45 Minutes, All to Myself
 
Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Gone with the Wind Full Collection
description:
This listing is for all six of the Gone with the Wind polishes. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

Set includes:

Ms. Melly
Katie Scarlett
Tara
I Don't Give A Damn
Bonnie Blue
Fiddle Di Dee

name: Ms. Melly
description: Ms. Melly is a toasted almond nude with glimmers of angelic gold. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Katie Scarlett
description: Katie Scarlett is inspired by pinched blush cheeks and Ms. O'Hara's quest to stay young and unchanged by the passing years. This barely mauve pink base holds fuchsia, white and gold micro glitters. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Tara
description: Tara is the constant throughout the story, this beloved piece of earth. It shifts from deep rich green to a bronze/brown. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: I Don't Give A Damn
description: I Don't Give a Damn is a scrumptious garnet red with micro ruby glitter. A testimony of Scarlett and Rhett's viciously lovely relationship. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Fiddle Di Dee
description: Fiddle Di Dee is a lovely royal plum color with copper sparkles. A favorite saying from the film. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Bonnie Blue
description: Bonnie Blue is a deep, velvety, almost navy color with royal blue, sapphire, and silver micro glitters. Reminiscent of Ms. Bonnie's dress in the fateful pony scene. Each polish is hand made with 3-free base and fine glitters and pigments. Your bottles are vintage and American made. (full size only) Each is 10 ml. for the large size and 5 ml. for the mini. See you at the movies!

name: Full Set of Zombie Plan Polishes
description:
This is for either the full size or mini size of all six polishes from the Zombie Plan Collection

Rotting Flesh
Double Tapped
It's BFM!
Specific Playland
Beware the Bathroom

Happy Polishing!

name: Rotting Flesh
description: Rotting Flesh has black and bronze micro glitters and matte neon green hexes in a dusty grey base for that dead for weeks/infected look we're all going for this season.

name: Double Tapped
description: A sheer black jelly with pink and red holo dots and pink micro holos for that pink spray effect.

name: It's BFM!
description: It's BFM! (Bill F@#king Murray) from the Zombie Plan collection. A ghostly white crelly base with black and blue diamond, pink dot, and white micro square glitters.

name: Twin Keys
description: Inspired by the sponge cakes with the creamy filling, this yellow crelly has orange micro glitters, yellow hexes and white dots. What would you do for a twinkie in the zombie apocalypse?

name: Specific Playland
description: This is a purple jelly with moons, stars, holo slivers, and matte hexes in varying sizes and colors. Carnival in a bottle.

name: Beware the Bathroom
description: A clinical blue-grey base with shots of white, blue, red, and black. Check the stalls. Pick up your feet.

name: Starlette Travel Cuticle Balm
description: Starlette travel size cuticle balms are perfect for cuticle care on the go when you need it most. Enriching Shea butter, almond oil, and vitamin E will soothe your dry spots and calm your calluses.

name: Starlette Hand Scrubs
description: Starlette sugar scrubs are made with sweet almond and jojoba oil, sugar, and essential oils to exfoliate and moisturize your hands. Baby soft skin awaits! Each scrub is 4 oz.

name: Full Set of Catching Flames Collection
description:
Cant choose which ones you want to add to your collection? Then go for the full set of Catching Flames polishes. All the spark and texture in one order, for a great price! 

The Clock
Revolution
Pin Bird
Feathers & Flame
Trident
Big City


Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

Questions, requests and comments welcome!

email: cinemaswatchlacquers@gmail.com
Cinema Swatch - Celluloid For Your Nails

name: The Clock
description:
Do you like clues? No one detail is more important than The Clock. A blue to purple shift that hides a secret only the sun can reveal. This shifter is also a holo! Sparkling in the sun and ever changing in the shade, like the waters around an island. 

*swatch by @polishismyheaven of Instagram

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

Cinema Swatch - Celluloid For Your Nails

name: Pin Bird
description:
Pin Bird is a speckled feather coat in a clear base. This bird can be layered over any color for a fun textured mani. Red and black slices paired with white and gray micro hexes. 

*swatch by @bluevelvetlacquer of Instagram

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

name: Revolution
description:
Revolution starts with a spark, and this one delivers! With an awesome three color shift from pink to orange to gold, red fire micros and gold flake, it's sure to inspire your next uprising!

*swatch by @capitalpolish of Instagram

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

kik: gingeriynn

name: Big City
description:
Big City is a silver holo glitter bomb in a shimmery pink base. The mix of hex, shard, mini and micro come together like the crowds of spectators at the games. Tons of glamour and sharp colors!

*swatch by @bluevelvetlacquer of Instagram


Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

name: Trident
description:
Trident has a silver to aqua shift with teal and silver micro glitters scattered throughout. The shift on this one is subtle. Maybe this polish will be your watery weapon of choice!

*swatch by @polishismyheaven of Instagram

name: Feathers & Flame
description:
Nothing more incredible than the heroine herself, Feathers&Flame is a surprise in every way! White, iridescent and glittery alone or over light colors, then an explosion of color and gold hexes when used over black or navy. Which way will you wear it?

*swatch by @capitalpolish of Instagram

name: Full Set of Catching Flames Collection MINI
description:
This listing is for the mini version of the Catching Flames collection.

Each mini is 3.5ml of polish, and comes in a 35mm film canister for storage and safe keeping. Each film canister comes with a swatch sticker that can be labelled or polish color added to and attached to canister lid for easy access to color type. 

Happy Polishing!

name: The Wiz of O.M.G Collection
description:

The Green City

Put the Todo in the Basket

name: Ruby Shoes
description:
Capturing the essence of that famous footwear with a pearl red crelly base and lots of cherry and ruby glitters that will have you clicking your heels too!

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

name: The Green City
description:
This olive gold semi-shear base holds glints of emerald, gold, and even sapphire micro glitters. It's the stuff Emerald City was made of. This is two coats, but try three thin coats for extra dramatic effect. 

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

name: Sucker Club
description:
Inspired by giant candy suckers and smiling Munchkin faces, this sweet iridescent purple jelly holds lots of gradient pink hexes, pink neon micro dots, lavender dots and bars, and mesmerizing teal holo hexes. It also looks wonderful over black, as it really brings out the iridescent base. 

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

name: Put the Todo in the Basket
description:
This black crelly with slight brown shimmer has micro and medium sized silver glitters and matte black dots, inspired by the coat and twinkley eyes of everyone's favorite terrier. Shown is two coats plus topcoat. 

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!

name: Yellowbrick Gold
description:
This butter yellow crelly holds sunset yellow squares, bars, and gold holo hexes that glimmer in the light. Layers beautifully, and great over white!

name: Judy's Blue
description:
A beautiful light blue jelly with micro sapphire glitters, iridescent clear, light and royal blue hexes and white stars. Inspired by the lovely Judy Garland and her character Dorothy Gale from the classic movie Wizard Of Oz. This polish is part of a collection of 6. 

Cinema Swatch is a brand new indie polish line dedicated to the love of polish and movies. All polishes are inspired by film and reference the scenes and lines we all love through franken creations. We hope you will love them as much as we do!
